title: Pattern 7
description:
Problem Description

Write a program to input an integer N from the user and print first N rows of the following pattern:

A
A B
A B C
A B C D


Input Format

A single line of input containing a single integer N.


Output Format

First N rows of the given pattern with a trailing space at the end of each line.


Constraints

﻿0≤N≤260 \le N \le 260≤N≤26﻿


Example 

5
A 
A B 
A B C 
A B C D 
A B C D E

test_cases.output: A
